title: Rob Ferretti
description:
Rob Ferretti has operated several exotic car rental businesses, is the organizer of Adventure Drives, and the host of the YouTube channel, SuperSpeedsRob. He's in town to see the opening of WCCS.  Topics include Rob's Ferrari 360, Adventure Drives 2020 highlights, and the new show Rob and Matt are hosting.  @robferretti

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @robferretti

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @robferretti

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/Dw711ujSoYI
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
